wooden_sword.name: wooden_sword
wooden_sword.description: A wooden sword. It's not very powerful, but it's better than nothing.

iron_sword.name: iron_sword
iron_sword.description: An iron sword. It's much stronger than a wooden sword.

diamond_sword.name: diamond_sword
diamond_sword.description: A diamond sword. It's the strongest sword in the game.

wooden_armour.name: wooden_armour
wooden_armour.description: An Armour that gives you basic protection on ur arms and legs. Tough it does cost you a bit of agility
